name: Unique identifier
definition: Is there a unique identifier for a person in the data source?

name: Geographic regions
definition: Are data on geographic region available?

name: Family linkage
definition: Is any linkage available in the data bank between any of the following persons?

name: Family linkage routinely
definition: Is familial linkage created routinely?

name: Family linkage permanently
definition: Is familial linkage created permanently?

name: Family linkage ad-hoc
definition: Can familial linkage can linkage be performed on an ad-hoc basis?

name: Sociodemographics
definition: Which of the following sociodemographic information is included? Select all that apply

name: Population pregnancy and neonates
definition: Does the data source collect information on pregnant women and/or neonatal subpopulation?

name: Diagnoses codes included
definition: Is information on diagnostic codes or medical events included, select all vocabulary items that apply

name: Diagnoses codes included: Not coded (Free text)
label: Not coded (Free text)

name: Hospital admission discharge
definition: Is information on hospital admission and/or discharge available?

name: ICU admission
definition: Is information on intensive care unit admission available?

name: Cause of death
definition: Is cause of death available?

name: Cause of death vocabulary
definition: What cause of death vocabulary is used? Select from the following:

name: Cause of death vocabulary: Not captured
label: Not captured

name: Cause of death vocabulary: SNOMED CT
label: SNOMED CT

name: Cause of death vocabulary: Not coded (Free text)
label: Not coded (Free text)

name: Rare diseases
definition: Are rare diseases (<1 in 2000 people) captured?

name: Prescriptions included
definition: Is information on prescriptions or dispensings of medications included?

name: Dispensings included
definition: Is information on prescriptions or dispensings of medications included?

name: Product information
definition: Is product information available? Select all items that apply

name: Product information vocabulary
definition: Is medicinal product information available? Select all items vocabularies that apply

name: Product information vocabulary: Not coded (Free text)
label: Not coded (Free text)

name: ATMP
definition: Is information on advanced therapy medicinal products included?

name: Contraception
definition: Is information on contraceptives included?

name: Indication for use
definition: If medicines information is captured, is the indication for use recorded? Select all items vocabularies that apply

name: Indication for use: Not coded (Free text)
label: Not coded (Free text)

name: Administration vaccines
definition: Administration vaccines included

name: Medical devices
definition: Is information on medical devices included?

name: Procedures
definition: Is information on procedures (e.g., diagnostic tests, therapeutic, surgical) included?

name: Procedures vocabulary
definition: If information on medical procedures is captured, select all vocabularies that apply

name: Clinical measures
definition: Is information on clinical measures included (e.g., BMI, blood pressure)?

name: Healthcare centre
definition: Is information on the healthcare centre (e.g., pharmacy, general practice, hospital) available?

name: Healthcare provider
definition: Is information on the person providing healthcare (e.g., physician, pharmacist, specialist) available?

name: Genetic data
definition: If genotyping information is available, select all vocabularies that apply

name: Biomarker data
definition: Is biomarker information available, select all vocabularies that apply

name: Patient-generated data
definition: Is patient-generated information (e.g.,from wearable devices) available?

name: Patient-reported data
definition: Are patient-reported outcomes (e.g quality of life) available?

name: Quality of life
definition: Are quality of life measures available? Select all that apply

name: Quality of life: Not coded (Free text)
label: Not coded (Free text)

name: Health care costs
definition: Is information on costs of healthcare available?

name: Free text
definition: Is free text information available?

definition: Care setting

name: Primary care - specialist level (e.g. paediatricians)
definition: Care setting

definition: Care setting
